mapper.insert: insert into bj_system_article_temp(carModel, carFirm, articleType, articleWebsite, articleUrl, articleAuthor, articleTime, articleTitle, articleContent, createdBy, createdTime,updatedBy,updatedTime) values( #{carModel}, #{carFirm}, #{articleType}, #{articleWebsite}, #{articleUrl}, #{articleAuthor}, #{articleTime}, #{articleTitle}, #{articleContent}, #{createdBy}, #{createdTime},#{updatedBy},#{updatedTime});
mapper.select: select * from bj_system_article_temp order by id desc;
